alert.note: Alert for Fentress (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:21AM CDT until June 26 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN OVERTON...PICKETT...CLAY AND FENTRESS COUNTIES... At 1221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tompkinsville to near Sunnybrook to Oneida, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Celina, Byrdstown, Allardt, Wolf River Dock, Moss, Dale Hollow Lake, Pickett State Park, Pall Mall and Standing Stone State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
